name: Haji Kadir Food Chains Pte Ltd

reviews.text: Requested for less spicy but turns out food was extra spicy, with more Chili Padi in our dishes. Totally unacceptable, maybe there was miscommunication among the cooks but please pay more attention to customer's extra details/requests on their food. The food are Maggi Goreng Thai & Maggi Goreng Seafood. Hope this will improve on my next visit.
food was horrendous. Noodles no flavour. My eggs were pink. Too much food colouring in the food. I bought sup tulang and its horrendous too. I had one bite and i couldnt continue eating.
Don't even show prices, pronounce $3.30 as $3.20 then show attitude when send wrong. SHOW THE PRICES LA. Their work station so dirty somemore. Bad place. Hope SFA come check often.

I ordered Maggi Goreng Merah Beef from Haji Kadir at Tampines Polyview through Grab, but ended up receiving what looked and tasted like Maggi Goreng Tom Yum Seafood instead. Luckily, I’m not allergic to seafood, but this mistake could have been serious if I were. It’s really important for a restaurant to get orders right, especially when it comes to food allergies. A little more attention could prevent dangerous situations. I’m really disappointed with this experience and hope they take more care in the future.

Asked for less spicy mee maggi goreng thai & seafood but come with superhot cilipadi !!! When feedback, the boss push the blame to the cook and never care to apologise, both the voss & cook!! Absurd attitude!!.pls AVOID THIS TAMPINES CHAIN. POOR HYGIENNE TOO...
